t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Marisa should still be surrounded by shiny gold.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I don't see any difference in the moods between myself and her.
Let me ask. Are you ugly?

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: No! Do you see I look better with this hair, compared to you who also appears to be unaffected?

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Wrong! The answer to that is no as well!

t_scene_info.speaker: Asta:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Why don't you like this hair?

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: It's become my worst nightmare. Are you braindead about what has happened here?

t_scene_info.speaker: Asta:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Nothing. You're probably braindead and not me.

t_scene_info.speaker: Sanae:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Foul beast. You're not willing to help me save myself from this.

t_scene_info.speaker: Asta:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I've had enough of this. You're screwed.
